level.heading: EMS PROVIDERS – ADVANCED EMERGENCY MEDICAL TECHNICIAN (§ 29-518)

level.text: 518.1 Each applicant for certification as an Advanced Emergency Medicalechnician (AEMT) shall submit an application to the Director to be consideredor a District of Columbia AEMT certification. The application shall include:
A copy of a valid NREMT-AEMT (or greater) certification card;
A copy of a valid AHA Health Care Provider (or equivalent) CPR card;
A completed application signed by the sponsoring EMS agency’s medicalirector; and
A check or money order made out in the appropriate fee made payable to the D.C.reasurer (if applicable).
518.2 Upon receipt of a complete application, the Director shall review thepplication and, if approved, shall issue a D.C. AEMT certification card.
